      <div id="feature4">
       <h2 class="feature2">
        Healthy Energy Drinks and Mental Fitness™
       </h2>
       <p>
        Each new day presents challenges that, if not met and
                 overcome, may leave you less fit mentally to control your life . . . to achieve
                 your financial goals . . . to set the stage for pursuing your personal happiness.
       </p>
       <p>
        Now there's a way to insure against the consequences of
                 falling short of your goals and to offer you more control over your life.
       </p>
       <p>
        By starting each day with a cool, refreshing glass of delicious
        <b>
         BLAST™
        </b>
        (or
        <b>
         BLAST II™ Sugar-Free
        </b>
        ,
        <b>
         FastBLAST™
        </b>
        ,
        <b>
         TurboBLAST
                 II™
        </b>
        ,
        <b>
         WOW™
        </b>
        , or
        <b>
         Memory Rules™
        </b>
        ),
                 you can embrace a Mental Fitness™ program that can blow away your neural
                 cobwebs and blast away the financial storm clouds that may hold you back.
       </p>
       <p>
        Life Enhancement has an entire line of healthy drink mixes, 
                 many of which are
        <a href="http://www.life-enhancement.com/productList.aspx?type=category&amp;id=32">
         healthy energy drink mixes
        </a>
        .
                 These include the
        <b>
         BLAST
        </b>
        family mentioned above, all of which employ the amino acid phenylalanine, a
                 precursor to an important memory molecule, noradrenaline, and your brain's
                 version of adrenaline. They
                 also include the necessary enzyme cofactors vitamin B
        <sub>
         6
        </sub>
        , vitamin C, copper, and
                 folic acid, along with natural flavors.
       </p>
       <p>
        Also in the healthy energy drink mix product line are
        <b>
         Memory Upgrade™
        </b>
        ,
        <b>
         Memory Upgrade II™
        </b>
        , and
        <b>
         Memory Upgrade III™ Sugar-Free.
        </b>
        These formulations are based on the
                 nutrient choline, which is the precursor to an important memory molecule
                 involved in concentration and focus.* As we age, choline becomes less bioavailable, with serious
                 consequences for memory function. The
        <b>
         Memory Upgrade
        </b>
        family are great-tasting, natural,
                 fruit-flavored citrus cooler containing choline and essential nutrient
                 cofactors plus the important amino acid taurine. The
        <b>
         Memory Upgrades
        </b>
        make it easy to ensure adequate levels of choline.
       </p>
       <p>
        Some of the choline in your diet is used by your brain and motor nerves to make the
                 neurotransmitter acetylcholine, which is critical for proper memory function
                 and muscle tone.* Taurine is a brain food that provides your brain with a vital
                 nutrient needed for proper function.* Use
        <b>
         Memory Upgrade III
        </b>
        to help
        <a href="http://www.life-enhancement.com/productList.aspx?type=category&amp;id=6">
         preserve and protect your memory function
        </a>
        .*
       </p>
       <p>
        A
        <b>
         BLAST™
        </b>
        family product can be taken together with a
        <b>
         Memory Upgrade
        </b>
        line
                 product for
        <a href="http://www.life-enhancement.com/productList.aspx?type=category&amp;id=2">
         greater energy
        </a>
        .
       </p>
      </div>

    <script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">
     //<![CDATA[
 		var timeoutID = 0;
 		var curSlideID = 0;
 
 		$(document).ready(function () {
 			$("#title1").fadeOut(1);
 			$("#title2").fadeOut(1);
 			$("#title3").fadeOut(1);
 
 			$(".titleBtn").click(function () { clickSlide($(this).attr('id').slice(8, 9)); });
 
 			$("#emailAddressBtn").click(function () { submitEmailForm(); return false; });
 
 			$("#emailAddress").click(function () {
 				clearEmailTextbox();
 			});
 
 			startTimer();
 		});
 
 		function clearEmailTextbox() {
 			if ($("#emailAddress").val() === "My e-mail address")
 			{
 				$("#emailAddress").css('color', '#000');
 				$("#emailAddress").val('');
 			}
 		}
 
 		function resetEmailForm() {
 			$("#postSignUp").hide();
 			$("#preSignUp").show();
 			$("#emailAddress").css('color', '#000');
 			$("#emailAddress").val('');
 			$("#emailAddress").focus();
 			$("#postSignUp").html("<img src=\"/images/loading.gif\" alt=\"Loading Indicator\" />");
 		}
 		
 		function submitEmailForm() {
 			$("#preSignUp").hide();
 			$("#postSignUp").show();
 
 			var email = $("#emailAddress").val();
 			var dataString = "{'emailAddress':'" + email + "'}";
 
 			$.ajax({
 				type: "POST",
 				url: "/ajaxFunctions.asmx/emmaSubscribe",
 				data: dataString,
 				contentType: "application/json; charset=utf-8",
 				dataType: 'json',
 				success: function (data) {
 					if (data.d === "pass") {
 						$("#postSignUp").html("Thank you for subscribing to our e-mail list!<br /><br /><a href=\"http://www.life-enhancement.com\" onclick=\"resetEmailForm(); return false;\">Add another e-mail address</a>");
 						$("#postSignUp").css('color', 'green');
 					}
 					else {
 						$("#postSignUp").html("Perhaps you mistyped your e-mail address?<br /><br /><a href=\"http://www.life-enhancement.com\" onclick=\"resetEmailForm(); return false;\">Try again?</a>");
 						$("#postSignUp").css('color', '#dd0000');
 					}
 				},
 				error: function (jqXHR, textStatus, errorThrown) {
 					$("#postSignUp").html("The subscription system is temporarily down.  Please send an e-mail to <a href=\"mailto:info@life-enhancement.com\">info@life-enhancement.com</a> and ask to be subscribed.<br /><br /><a href=\"http://www.life-enhancement.com\" onclick=\"resetEmailForm(); return false;\">Try again?</a>");
 					$("#postSignUp").css('color', '#dd0000');
 				}
 			});
 
 			return false;
 		}
 
 		function startTimer() {
 			timeoutID = setTimeout(function () { autoSlide(); }, 9000);
 		}
 
 		function clickSlide(newSlideID) {
 			clearTimeout(timeoutID);
 
 			if (newSlideID != curSlideID) {
 				slide(newSlideID);
 			}
 		}
 
 		function autoSlide() {
 			timeoutID = setTimeout(function () { autoSlide(newSlideID + 1); }, 9000);
 
 			var newSlideID = 0;
 
 			if (curSlideID < 3) {
 				newSlideID = curSlideID + 1;
 			}
 
 			slide(newSlideID);
 		}
 
 		function slide(newSlideID) {
 			$("#title" + curSlideID).fadeOut(900);
 			$("#title" + newSlideID).fadeIn(900);
 			$("#titleBtn" + curSlideID).css('background-color', '#ffffff');
 			$("#titleBtn" + newSlideID).css('background-color', '#034874');
 
 			curSlideID = newSlideID;
 		}
 	//]]>
    </script>
